overview.en: The total amount of Best is 10 billion, aiming to build a global cross-border trade digital ecosystem, based on distributed data collection and storage, to achieve data transparency and non-tamperable, to establish an effective digital ecosystem and a sound consensus trust mechanism; to build a blockchain public foundation Facility, support the development of ecological applications, achieve key data winding, and realize the realization of cross-border trade data value
overview.zh: Best总量为100亿,目的打造全球跨境贸易数字生态体系，基于分布式数据采集和存储，实现数据透明和不可篡改， 建立有效的数字生态和健全的共识信任机制；建设区块链公共基础设施，支撑生态应用的 开发，实现关键数据上链，完成跨境贸易数据价值变现
